dmca.title: [EV1-C1578791O] RE: (COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT - STOLEN WEBSITE)
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Saturday, October 28, 2006 10:57 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1578791O] RE: (COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT - STOLEN WEBSITE) Subject: [EV1-C1578791O] RE: (COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT - STOLEN WEBSITE) From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [EV1-C1578791O] RE: (COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT - STOLEN WEBSITE) Reference: [EV1-C1578791O] For your review. -- Regards, Abuse Department The Planet - EV1Servers http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html http://ev1servers.net/About/aup.aspx http://ev1servers.net/About/tos.aspx ==== Original Message ==== 1. Sun, 29 Oct 2006 03:45:11 -0600 Received: from [124.106.176.85] (helo=wow1) by dime129.dizinc.com with esmtpa (Exim 4.52) id 1Ge7AP-0002y1-LK for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 29 Oct 2006 04:45:03 -0500 Return-Receipt-To: "Rick St. John" Reply-To: "Rick St. John" From: "Rick St. John" To: Subject: RE: (COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT - STOLEN WEBSITE) Date: Sun, 29 Oct 2006 16:38:43 -0500 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0000_01C6FB78.B536E9C0" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.5510 Thread-Index: Acb7optqtiO/mRJERtes/5IHAufK5w== X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 Disposition-Notification-To: "Rick St. John" X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - dime129.dizinc.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [0 0] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - wowphilippinestravelagency.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 66.7.194.207 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of wowphilippinestravelagency.com) client-ip=66.7.194.207; envelope-from=rick@wowphilippinestravelagency.com; helo=dime129.dizinc.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 29 Oct 2006 09:45:20.0045 (UTC) FILETIME=[F26D95D0:01C6FB3E] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/related) (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hello the Planet Hello, This is Rick St. John and Mary Jane P Bangga of WOW Philippines Travel Company in Manila Philippines. I am a US Citizen living in the Philippines. On October 27 2006 it was brought to my attention that my website, www.boracay.org.ph hosted at www.manilahosting.net a reseller for www.hostdime.com had been suspended by a phone call or email from one Roland B. Lacre an EX-Employee of WOW Philippines Travel Company, claiming copyright infringement. We are contacting you directly as I have gotten no help from www.hostgater.com where the site, www.boracaph.com is hosted, this site is an exact duplicate of ours, in-fact Roland has stolen all the information from WOW Philippines Travel Agency when he worked for us, starting in March of 2006. If you look at the site www.boracayph.com you will see there are no phone numbers, or contact person other than an email account. Our travel sites all have live chat, 800 numbers and real persons to chat with. We are a legally register travel agency. We are sending, again the following documents to you showing that we are who we say we are, our legal papers, Roland B. Lacre employment contract, my wife and I out passports, WOW Philippines ID and SEC Papers. WE HAVE BEEN COMPLETELY IGNORED BY WWW.HOSTGATOR.COM AFTER SEVERAL EAMILS IT APPEARS THEY HAVE NO INTEREST IN ASSISTING US. Please be advised to the following information; WOW Philippines Travel Company in Manila Philippines is a legally registered company authorized to facilitate travel since July 14 2005. It has come to our attention early today that, Roland B. Lacre and EX-EMPLOYEE who owns the name www.boracayph.com and host his site with www.hostgator.com has copied our information off our website, www.boracay.org.ph and placed the site on the internet in hopes to sell hotel and resort bookings through another agency, www.travelsmart.net also located here in Manila Philippines. If you go to the website owned by Roland B Lacre, www.boracayph.com there are NO phone numbers or physical address information, just email contact with no person's name. Currently WOW Philippines Travel Company has a case filed with the National Bureau of Investigations, Special Agent James Tosoc is the person in charge of the investigation, and would really appreciate any help in locating Roland B. Lacre, a physical address would really be helpful. You can contact Special Agent James Sherrill J. Tosoc directly at, office +63 2 523 8231 local 3447 or at cell phone +63 919 440 7240 these are Philippines based phone numbers. We would like to ask that you suspend his account, PERMENTLY; we are forwarding our company documents to show we are who we say we are and all information about WOW Philippines Travel Company can be verified, if you need anything else, please just ask. Best regards. Rick L. St. John President/CEO WOW Philippines Travel Agency 2508 Syquia Street, HLL Building Suite 3-A Santa Ana Manila, Philippines 1009 Philippines Direct+63 2 561 7389 USA / Canada 1-877-WOW-PHIL rick@wowphilippinestravelagency.com Hotels, Resorts, Travel Reservations Beach Resorts. Native Cottages. Resort Packages. Airline Reservations. Group Accommodations. Private Charters. Private Beach Houses. Private Tours. Island Hopping. Manila Hotels. Professional Luxury Travel Consulting. View: www.wowphilippinestravelagency.com , www.boracay-beach-resorts.com , www.boracaytraveldirectory.com , www.boracay4less.com , www.boracay.cc , www.boracaywild.com , www.boracayblue.com , , www.boracay.org.ph , www.boracay-packages.com , www.boracay-golf.com , www.boracay-hotels-resorts.com , www.boracayflights.com , www.aaaboracayresorts.com , MIME element (text/html)

Hello the Planet

 

Hello,

 

This is Rick St. John and Mary Jane P Bangga of WOW Philippines Travel Company in Manila Philippines. I am a US Citizen living in the Philippines. On October 27 2006 it was brought to my attention that my website, www.boracay.org.ph hosted at www.manilahosting.net a reseller for www.hostdime.com had been suspended by a phone call or email from one Roland B. Lacre an EX-Employee of WOW Philippines Travel Company, claiming copyright infringement.

 

We are contacting you directly as I have gotten no help from www.hostgater.com where the site, www.boracaph.com is hosted, this site is an exact duplicate of ours, in-fact Roland has stolen all the information from WOW Philippines Travel Agency when he worked for us, starting in March of 2006.

 

If you look at the site www.boracayph.com you will see there are no phone numbers, or contact person other than an email account. Our travel sites all have live chat, 800 numbers and real persons to chat with. We are a legally register travel agency.

 

We are sending, again the following documents to you showing that we are who we say we are, our legal papers, Roland B. Lacre employment contract, my wife and I out passports, WOW Philippines ID and SEC Papers.

 

WE HAVE BEEN COMPLETELY IGNORED BY WWW.HOSTGATOR.COM AFTER SEVERAL EAMILS IT APPEARS THEY HAVE NO INTEREST IN ASSISTING US.

 

Please be advised to the following information;

 

WOW Philippines Travel Company in Manila Philippines is a legally registered company authorized to facilitate travel since July 14 2005. It has come to our attention early today that, Roland B. Lacre and EX-EMPLOYEE who owns the name www.boracayph.com and host his site with www.hostgator.com has copied our information off our website, www.boracay.org.ph and placed the site on the internet in hopes to sell hotel and resort bookings through another agency, www.travelsmart.net also located here in Manila Philippines.

 

If you go to the website owned by Roland B Lacre, www.boracayph.com there are NO phone numbers or physical address information, just email contact with no person’s name.

 

Currently WOW Philippines Travel Company has a case filed with the National Bureau of Investigations, Special Agent James Tosoc is the person in charge of the investigation, and would really appreciate any help in locating Roland B. Lacre, a physical address would really be helpful. You can contact Special Agent James Sherrill J. Tosoc directly at, office +63 2 523 8231 local 3447 or at cell phone +63 919 440 7240 these are Philippines based phone numbers.

 

We would like to ask that you suspend his account, PERMENTLY; we are forwarding our company documents to show we are who we say we are and all information about WOW Philippines Travel Company can be verified, if you need anything else, please just ask.

 

 

Best regards.

 

Rick L. St. John
President/CEO

 

WOW Philippines Travel Agency
2508 Syquia Street, HLL Building Suite 3-A
Santa Ana Manila, Philippines 1009

Philippines Direct+63 2 561 7389

USA< /u1:country-region> / Canada 1-877-WOW-PHIL

rick@wowphilippinestra velagency.com

 

Hotels, Resorts, Travel Reservations

 

Beach Resorts. Native Cottages. Resort Packages. Airline Reservations. Group Accommodations. Private Charters. Private Beach Houses. Private Tours. Island Hopping. Manila Hotels. Professional Luxury Travel Consulting.

 

View: www.wowphilippinestra velagency.com, www.boracay-beach-resorts. com, www.boracaytraveldirector y.com, www.boracay4less.com,  www.boracay.cc, www.boracaywild.com, www.boracayblue.com, , www.boracay.org.ph, www.boracay-packages.com, www.boracay-golf.com, www.boracay-hotels-resort s.com, www.boracayflights.com, www.aaaboracayresorts.com,
